docs.lead_paragraph: A British daredevil known for his vertigo-inspiring online videos chronicling his climbs up buildings and construction cranes was interrogated by Dubai police over his recent ascents in the sheikhdom, authorities said Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Dubai Police Question British Daredevil in Skyscraper Climbs
headline.main: Dubai Police Question British Daredevil in Skyscraper Climbs

docs.snippet: A British daredevil known for his vertigo-inspiring online videos chronicling his climbs up buildings and construction cranes was interrogated by Dubai police over his recent ascents in the sheikhdom, authorities said Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Visiting New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Sunday that a recent rash of anti-Semitic acts in the United States was "reprehensible" and his state would have no tolerance for them.

headline.print_headline: Cuomo Calls Anti-Semitic Attack in New York 'Reprehensible'
headline.main: Cuomo Calls Anti-Semitic Attack in New York 'Reprehensible'

docs.snippet: Visiting New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Sunday that a recent rash of anti-Semitic acts in the United States was "reprehensible" and his state would have no tolerance for them....

docs.lead_paragraph: Cursive writing is looping back into style in schools across the country after a generation of students who know only keyboarding, texting and printing out their words longhand.

headline.print_headline: Flip the Script: Cursive Sees Revival in School Instruction
headline.main: Flip the Script: Cursive Sees Revival in School Instruction

docs.snippet: Cursive writing is looping back into style in schools across the country after a generation of students who know only keyboarding, texting and printing out their words longhand....

docs.lead_paragraph: Two big Irish energy projects designed to reduce dependence on Britain are set to benefit from EU funding as the bloc steps up efforts to support the country with the most to lose when its bigger neighbor quits the European Union.

headline.print_headline: EU Readies Cash to Help Ireland Cut Energy Dependence on Brexit Britain
headline.main: EU Readies Cash to Help Ireland Cut Energy Dependence on Brexit Britain

docs.snippet: Two big Irish energy projects designed to reduce dependence on Britain are set to benefit from EU funding as the bloc steps up efforts to support the country with the most to lose when its bigger neighbor quits the European Union....

docs.lead_paragraph: Defectors who arrive from the North with important information on the military or the regime’s inner workings will get $860,000, up from $217,000.

headline.print_headline: Hoping to Lure High-Level Defectors, South Korea Increases Rewards
headline.main: Hoping to Lure High-Level Defectors, South Korea Increases Rewards

docs.snippet: Defectors who arrive from the North with important information on the military or the regime’s inner workings will get $860,000, up from $217,000....

docs.lead_paragraph: A diplomatic rift between Turkey and key European nations deepened Sunday as President Recep Tayyip Erdogan accused Germany of "Nazi practices," days after a local authority prevented a Turkish minister from addressing a rally.

headline.print_headline: Turkey Accuses Germany of 'Nazi' Practices; Rift Deepens
headline.main: Turkey Accuses Germany of 'Nazi' Practices; Rift Deepens

docs.snippet: A diplomatic rift between Turkey and key European nations deepened Sunday as President Recep Tayyip Erdogan accused Germany of "Nazi practices," days after a local authority prevented a Turkish minister from addressing a rally....

docs.lead_paragraph: Malaysia said Sunday that its expulsion of North Korea's ambassador was intended to warn Pyongyang that it cannot manipulate the investigation into the killing of the North Korean leader's half brother.

headline.print_headline: Malaysia: Ambassador's Expulsion Is a Warning to North Korea
headline.main: Malaysia: Ambassador's Expulsion Is a Warning to North Korea

docs.snippet: Malaysia said Sunday that its expulsion of North Korea's ambassador was intended to warn Pyongyang that it cannot manipulate the investigation into the killing of the North Korean leader's half brother....

docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis has called on the faithful to consult the Bible with the same frequency as they might consult their cellphones for messages.

headline.print_headline: Pope Urges Faithful to Consult Bible as Often as Cellphones
headline.main: Pope Urges Faithful to Consult Bible as Often as Cellphones

docs.snippet: Pope Francis has called on the faithful to consult the Bible with the same frequency as they might consult their cellphones for messages....

docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said he would meet Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow on Thursday to voice opposition to what the Israeli leader charged were Iran's attempts to establish a permanent military foothold in Syria.

headline.print_headline: Netanyahu to Meet Putin, Says Iran Seeks Permanent Foothold in Syria
headline.main: Netanyahu to Meet Putin, Says Iran Seeks Permanent Foothold in Syria

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said he would meet Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow on Thursday to voice opposition to what the Israeli leader charged were Iran's attempts to establish a permanent military foothold in Syria....

docs.lead_paragraph: Police in a Seattle suburb say they are seeking a white gunman after an Indian Sikh man reported he was shot in the arm and told to "go back to your own country."

headline.print_headline: Indian Sikh Reports Being Shot in Arm; Police Seek Suspect
headline.main: Indian Sikh Reports Being Shot in Arm; Police Seek Suspect

docs.snippet: Police in a Seattle suburb say they are seeking a white gunman after an Indian Sikh man reported he was shot in the arm and told to "go back to your own country."...
